subject: Re: Remapping Jerome
msgSnippet: teraiten, I would like to remap the Gerome font so it matches Unifon.  You mentioned keyman on your site but I was unable to find it. Steve
messageBody:
teraiten,

I would like to remap the Gerome font
so it matches Unifon. You mentioned keyman
on your site but I was unable to find it.

Steve
www.unifon.org/unifon-intro.html


> And there are a few interesting programs available from pyrus.com .
> See my website for more info about Keyman, for keyboard remapping:
> http://teraiten.cjb.net/ and click on quickscript.
> Ewout Stam/Teraiten Sovo

so it matches Unifon.  You mentioned keyman
on your site but I was unable to find it.

Steve
